about_the_game:
Welcome to Game Room — your virtual gaming room!

Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of exciting leisure, where various classic and modern games are gathered in one room. Controlling the character in first-person mode, you can freely explore the gaming space, approach arcade machines or tables, and enjoy your favorite activities.

Features:

🎮 A Variety of Games:
Play checkers, darts, air hockey, billiards, or try classic arcade machines featuring "Snake," "Arkanoid," and pinball. There's something for everyone!

🏆 Global Leaderboard:
Track your progress on the board that displays total scores across all games.

👀 First-Person Mode:
Walk around the room, approach games, interact with objects, and feel the vibrant atmosphere of a live arcade zone.

✨ Classics in a Modern Format:
Rediscover classic games in a new package that combines nostalgia with modern technology.

🎯 Simple and Intuitive Gameplay:
Play with ease, but prepare for real challenges if you aim to break your records.

Game Room is perfect for all game lovers, whether casual players or fans of retro arcades. It's the ideal place to relax, test yourself in different genres, and have a great time.

Can you master every game? Your Game Room is waiting for you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 with latest service packs
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4 GB)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 with latest service packs
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 (4 GB)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 8.1 Compatible

short_description: Game Room is a virtual game room where you can play checkers, darts, air hockey, billiards, pinball, snake, and arkanoid. Explore the space from the first person, enjoy classic games, and beat your records
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Japanese
